title: Asking help from anyone who has completed the online interview for the admission.
content: Hi guys. I'm from Tamilnadu. Having finished my 12th grade I'm wishing to pursue B.Pharm in PES UNIVERSITY. I don't have a clue about this online interview that I need to attend for the admission.Any ideas on how the interview will be and the typical questions asked will be very much appreciated :)..

comments.body: heyy, they just asked me why do you wanna take pharmacy and my 10th and 12th marks so ig most prolly they'll ask you really simple questions like these
no issues, btw did you get in?
No yaarðŸ˜”. It's gone into waiting list. It's risky as if I pay the fee and didn't get in, it might be late to join anywhere else.
ahh dw, you'll get in, how was the interview?
Was easy. Hey can you ask if any seats have opened up ? Cause my family's rushing me to join some other college, and I really don't wanna go to any of the other colleges, please
